text:
[Verse]
Sun's going down it's getting late
Colors wash the sky in fate
Whispering waves they greet the shore
Moment so pure can't ask for more

[Verse 2]
Running fast to catch last light
Holding hands hearts feel so right
Shoes off feel the cooling sand
Time will stop when we're on this land

[Chorus]
Chasing sunsets feeling free
Just you and me eternally
We laugh we run we touch the sea
In this moment you belong to me

[Verse 3]
Stars emerge they light the night
Moon hangs low it’s a perfect sight
Echoes of our laughter play
Lingering here till break of day

[Bridge]
Hold me close don't let me go
Promise me you'll always show
Memories made in orange glow
We'll cherish this in hearts we know

[Verse 4]
Days may change but we'll come back
To this place love's golden track
Chasing sunsets every year
With you my love I have no fear
title: Chasing Sunsets
